H0.text: In which part of the human body is the limbic system. Spinal Cord

H1.text: In which part of the human body is the limbic system. Heart

H2.text: In which part of the human body is the limbic system. Lungs

H3.text: In which part of the human body is the limbic system. Brain

A4.text: In humans it is located on both sides of the thalamus, immediately beneath the medial temporal lobe of the cerebrum primarily in the forebrain.

A5.text: The limbic system is a set of brain structures involved in emotional processing and motivation in humans and many other animals.
